definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: hammer, sharpen, whet (NH id., hammer, tap; Aram. [[לְטַשׁ]], lt.a4 sharpen; Ar. lat.asa strike, tap);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִלְטוֹשׁ]] Job 16:9, Ps 7:13; Inf. cstr. [[לֵלְטוֹשׁ]] 1Sa 13:20; Pt. [[לֽטֵשׁ]];—
hammer, only Pt. = hammerer sq. [[כָּל־תׂרֵשׁ]] Ge 4:22 (J).
sharpen sword [[חֶרֶב]] (acc.) Ps 7:13; cf. 1Sa 13:20, obj. [[מַחֲרֶשֶׁת]], [[אֵת]], [[קַרְדּׂם]], [[מַחֲרֵשָׁה]]; fig. [[עֵינַיִם לִי]] ´[[ל]] Job 16:9 my foe whets his eye for me

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. [[תַּעַר מְלֻטָּשׁ]] Ps 52:4 a sharpened razor (in sim. of evil tongue).
